A human one? Maybe they’re repairing it.\""},{"lineNumber":34735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああまあ、そうだよな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that’s probably it...\""},{"lineNumber":34736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーあ、あんだけ勢い込んどいて負けんだもんな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah man, they were so fired up and still lost."},{"lineNumber":34737,"originalJapaneseLine":"　上の方々にも困ったもんだぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The higher-ups are really messed up, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":34738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人とか、もうケイブリス様以外居ないんだろ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There aren’t any demon lords left except Lord Cavebris, right?"},{"lineNumber":34739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひっでー目に遭ったぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ve had it rough."},{"lineNumber":34740,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早くこのスーツ、脱ぎてぇよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to get out of this suit soon.\""},{"lineNumber":34741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーだ。そのうち、俺が魔人になれないか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. Wha...!\""},{"lineNumber":34751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「に、人げ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hu-humans...!\""},{"lineNumber":34752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、うわあああああああああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, waaaaaaahhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":34753,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間だあああぁぁぁ！　人間の、軍隊だああ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Humans! It’s a human army!!\""},{"lineNumber":34754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「全軍、突撃！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"All troops, charge!\""},{"lineNumber":34755,"originalJapaneseLine":"荒れ狂う嵐のような襲撃が、魔物の森に吹き荒れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"A raging storm-like assault swept through the demon drum."},{"lineNumber":34762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、ッ――らあああぁぁっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O, oh――raaaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":34763,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どけどけどけぇーーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Get out of the way, get out of the wayーーーーー!!\""},{"lineNumber":34764,"originalJapaneseLine":"「5軍も行きやすぜぇ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"5th Army, move out too!"},{"lineNumber":34765,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ロレックス将軍においてかれねーうちに！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s not fall behind General Rolex!\""},{"lineNumber":34766,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに続くのが、ヘルマンの先鋒、5軍。","translatedEnglishLine":"Following them is Hermann’s vanguard, the 5th Army."},{"lineNumber":34767,"originalJapaneseLine":"厚みを持った突進が、混乱から冷める間を与えずに","translatedEnglishLine":"Their powerful charge leaves no time for confusion to settle,"},{"lineNumber":34768,"originalJapaneseLine":"蹂躙に蹂躙を重ねていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"overwhelming and trampling everything in their path."},{"lineNumber":34769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ち、速ぇーなあいつら！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-they’re fast!\""},{"lineNumber":34770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃま、将軍はほら、おトシがね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, the general is, you know, getting on in years.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『全員いるな？　目標は、魔物界の制圧だ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone present? The objective is to conquer the demon world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『魔王……美樹ちゃんを探し出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon King... we will find Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、舐めた真似をした魔物どもにやり返す』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, we'll get revenge on the demons who dared to mock us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全軍突撃だ！
――――ぶち殺せ！」
これまでの歴史の中で、幾度となく襲撃を受けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Throughout history, having been attacked countless times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達へ…………
今、初めての大攻勢が、幕を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, for the first time, a major offensive has begun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界、境界付近――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Near the border of the demon world――――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーい、どうした、足止めて」
「いや……なんか塀の向こう、うるせーなって……」
「塀？　人間のか？　復旧でもしてんだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A wall? A human one? Maybe they’re repairing it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああまあ、そうだよな……」
「あーあ、あんだけ勢い込んどいて負けんだもんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah man, they were so fired up and still lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上の方々にも困ったもんだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The higher-ups are really messed up, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人とか、もうケイブリス様以外居ないんだろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There aren’t any demon lords left except Lord Cavebris, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっでー目に遭ったぜ。
早くこのスーツ、脱ぎてぇよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to get out of this suit soon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そーだ。そのうち、俺が魔人になれないか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. Someday, maybe I’ll volunteer to become a demon lord myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志願してみっか。今度は勝つぜ」
「あっははは、馬鹿言え…………」
「……うわ。今のは俺にも聞こえたぞ。
祭りでもやってんのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are they having a festival or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや待て、この声……
なんか、さっきより大きく……」
「ラアアアアアアアアアァァァァァァッ！！」
「うっ、うわあああああああああ！
人間だあああぁぁぁ！　人間の、軍隊だああ！！」
「全軍、突撃！」
荒れ狂う嵐のような襲撃が、魔物の森に吹き荒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A raging storm-like assault swept through the demon forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リック将軍に続いて！
ボクたちの、いつも通りの全力で！」
北方軍の先鋒となるのは、リーザス赤の軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leading the Northern Army’s vanguard is the Red Army of Leesas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 槍に例えられる強力無比な突破力と進行速度が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their unparalleled penetration power and speed, likened to a spear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘体勢になく、半ば眠っていたも同然の魔物達への
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: served as a powerful and sudden awakening to the demons who were unprepared, almost half-asleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強烈すぎる目覚めの銅鑼となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like the deafening sound of a war drum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、ッ――らあああぁぁっ！
どけどけどけぇーーーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Get out of the way, get out of the wayーーーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「5軍も行きやすぜぇ！
ロレックス将軍においてかれねーうちに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s not fall behind General Rolex!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに続くのが、ヘルマンの先鋒、5軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following them is Hermann’s vanguard, the 5th Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 厚みを持った突進が、混乱から冷める間を与えずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their powerful charge leaves no time for confusion to settle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 蹂躙に蹂躙を重ねていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: overwhelming and trampling everything in their path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ち、速ぇーなあいつら！」
「そりゃま、将軍はほら、おトシがね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the general is, you know, getting on in years."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『魔王……美樹ちゃんを探し出す。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、舐めた真似をした魔物どもにやり返す』

どけどけどけぇーーーーーッ！」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに続くのが、ヘルマンの先鋒、5軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following them is Hermann’s vanguard, the 5th Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 厚みを持った突進が、混乱から冷める間を与えずに

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 蹂躙に蹂躙を重ねていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: overwhelming and trampling everything in their path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ち、速ぇーなあいつら！」
「そりゃま、将軍はほら、おトシがね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the general is, you know, getting on in years."
